message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.  While I can't disclose the specifics of the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm willing to offer it to you for a price of $1000000. This represents a significant potential return on your investment.  If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details further.  However, I've already received a guaranteed offer of $800000 from another buyer, so time is of the essence.
